targets.expr:
(sum(rate(grpc_server_handled_total{service="$service", service_namespace="$NS", grpc_type="unary", grpc_code="OK"}[$__interval])) OR on() vector(0) + 
sum(rate(grpc_server_handled_total{service="$service", service_namespace="$NS", grpc_type="unary", grpc_code="NotFound"}[$__interval])) OR on() vector(0) + 
sum(rate(grpc_server_handled_total{service="$service", service_namespace="$NS", grpc_type="unary", grpc_code="PermissionDenied"}[$__interval])) OR on() vector(0) + 
sum(rate(grpc_server_handled_total{service="$service", service_namespace="$NS", grpc_type="unary", grpc_code="InvalidArgument"}[$__interval])) OR on() vector(0))
/ 
sum(rate(grpc_server_handled_total{service="$service", service_namespace="$NS", grpc_type="unary"}[$__interval]))

sum(rate(grpc_client_started_total{service_name="$service", service_namespace="$NS", grpc_type="unary"}[$__interval])) by (grpc_service, grpc_method) - 
sum(rate(grpc_client_handled_total{service_name="$service", service_namespace="$NS", grpc_type="unary"}[$__interval])) by (grpc_service, grpc_method)
